entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
